uuid-3.title: Homepage Benefits Heading

content.text: One CMS to power all your sites and apps

uuid-3.heading_raw: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"One CMS to power all your sites and apps"}]}]}

uuid-3.body_raw: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Content is a critical part of your business strategy - future-proof your CMS for your marketers and developers."}]},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Develop and publish content all in one place"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Create the content model you need"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Drive operational efficiencies with flexible workflows"}]}]}]}]}

content.text: Content is a critical part of your business strategy - future-proof your CMS for your marketers and developers.
Develop and publish content all in one place
Create the content model you need
Drive operational efficiencies with flexible workflows

uuid-3.title: Design unique and powerful digital experiences for your brand
uuid-3.headline: Design unique and powerful digital experiences for your brand
uuid-3.label: Create Content

uuid-3.body_raw: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Content teams have the power to visualize and manage content changes, even if you’re running dotCMS headlessly."}]},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Easily manage pages with no-code visual editing tools"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Structure and reuse content across pages and sites"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Automatically translate content for your global reach"}]}]}]}]}

content.text: Content teams have the power to visualize and manage content changes, even if you’re running dotCMS headlessly.
Easily manage pages with no-code visual editing tools
Structure and reuse content across pages and sites
Automatically translate content for your global reach

uuid-3.title: Easily update and publish content to reduce dependency on developers
uuid-3.headline: Easily update and publish content to reduce dependency on developers
uuid-3.label: Manage Content

uuid-3.body_raw: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"dotCMS was built to be flexible and developer friendly, so you can architect the platform to work for your requirements."}]},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Manage multiple sites under one umbrella"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Customize your sites with our API-first model"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Integrate with your existing tech stack"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"}}]}

content.text: dotCMS was built to be flexible and developer friendly, so you can architect the platform to work for your requirements.
Manage multiple sites under one umbrella
Customize your sites with our API-first model
Integrate with your existing tech stack

uuid-3.title: Build the solution you need headlessly or with the dotCMS front-end
uuid-3.headline: Build the solution you need headlessly or with the dotCMS front-end
uuid-3.label: Deliver Content

uuid-3.body_raw: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Whether you’re consolidating multiple CMS’s, or your existing system just isn’t cutting it, dotCMS will adapt and scale with you."}]},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Performance, SEO and security are out of the box"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scale up with no caps to API calls, users, content types"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Expand and customize with the plug-in architecture"}]}]}]}]}

content.text: Whether you’re consolidating multiple CMS’s, or your existing system just isn’t cutting it, dotCMS will adapt and scale with you.
Performance, SEO and security are out of the box
Scale up with no caps to API calls, users, content types
Expand and customize with the plug-in architecture

uuid-3.title: Future-proof your content management roadmap
uuid-3.headline: Future-proof your content management roadmap
uuid-3.label: Scale Content

uuid-3.body_raw: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Marketing teams can make data-based decisions that improve conversion rates and user experiences."}]},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"A/B test copy & layouts and collect real-time feedback"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Publish successful tests instantly"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Personalize experiences based on geography, site actions, device and more"}]}]}]}]}

content.text: Marketing teams can make data-based decisions that improve conversion rates and user experiences.
A/B test copy & layouts and collect real-time feedback
Publish successful tests instantly
Personalize experiences based on geography, site actions, device and more

uuid-3.title: Ensure your content resonates with your audiences
uuid-3.headline: Ensure your content resonates with your audiences
uuid-3.label: Optimize Content

uuid-4.title: EXPLORE THE PLATFORM Title

content.text: dotCMS was built to
empower
all your teams

uuid-4.heading_raw: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"dotCMS was built to "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"text":"empower"},{"type":"text","text":" all your teams"}]}]}

content.text: We’ve got the
important things
covered
You're in
Good Company

containerStructures.code: #dotParse("//dotcms.com/application/containers/banner/banner.vtl")

uuid-1.title: Homepage Banner

content.text: dotCMS goes beyond headless, allowing developers and content teams to collaborate and deliver content globally, on any stack, at any scale.
One CMS to
power all
your sites, apps and digital experiences

uuid-1.heading_raw: {"type":"doc","attrs":{"charCount":138,"wordCount":21,"readingTime":1},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"One CMS to "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"text":"power all"},{"type":"text","text":" your sites, apps and digital experiences"}]}]}
uuid-1.subheading_raw: {"type":"doc","attrs":{"charCount":139,"wordCount":21,"readingTime":1},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"textAlign":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"dotCMS goes beyond headless, allowing developers and content teams to collaborate and deliver content globally, on any stack, at any scale."}]}]}

uuid-1.title: dotCMS now offers a business source license (BSL)
uuid-1.text: dotCMS is now licensed under the BSL/Business Source License.

#set($language = $languagewebapi.getLanguage("$!{dotContentMap.languageId}"))

container.name: System Container
container.title: System Container

page.metaDescription: dotCMS is the universal CMS for seamless content creation, management and delivery. Empower your team to easily manage content across any platform with unmatched flexibility and power. Consolidate digital experiences across channels and reduce developer dependency.
page.name: index
page.ogDescription: dotCMS empowers global brands to simplify content creation, management, and delivery. Consolidate digital experiences across channels, reduce developer dependency, and future-proof your business with our flexible, API-first Universal CMS.
page.title: dotCMS Universal CMS
